idea-plugin.name: Serial Port Tool
idea-plugin.description:
Android Studio Serial Port Tool Plugin

A comprehensive serial port communication tool for Android Studio and IntelliJ IDEA.

Features:

  • Port Management - Scan, connect, disconnect, and auto-reconnect to serial ports
  • Data Communication - Send and receive data in ASCII or HEX format
  • Real-time Display - View communication data with timestamps and auto-scroll
  • Quick Commands - Save and manage frequently used commands
  • Log Export - Export communication logs to text files
  • Port Configuration - Configure baud rate, data bits, stop bits, and parity
  • Persistent Settings - Automatically save your preferences

Usage:

  1. Open the Serial Port tool window from View → Tool Windows → Serial Port
  2. Select a serial port from the dropdown and set the baud rate
  3. Click "Connect" to establish connection
  4. Use the send field to transmit data
  5. Save frequently used commands with the "Quick Commands" button
  6. Export logs for analysis or debugging

Perfect for: IoT development, hardware debugging, embedded systems, Arduino communication, and any serial port testing needs.
